description:
With their unparalleled strength, our work pants can easily accompany you in the big chores around the house, at the cottage or even in the forest.

Composed of 65% recycled polyester and 35% cotton, it is reinforced at the ankles and back pockets for increased durability. Its double layer on the knees gives you openings suitable for knee pads, perfect for protection during ground work. Our work pants also contain 8 highly practical pockets, including one specially for a knife. In short, they are the robust and versatile pants par excellence.

For work in the garden, on the car, on the cache or even on the chalet, it will be your best ally!
name: Hooke Work Pants - Mens
